comments.body: Do you need `: String` here? also, I may not get the purpose of `final` here since `val` is already immutable but would it be simpler to declare the object as `final`?

comments.body: For public fields, we put the types explicitly. You are right about `final`. An `object` is already `final`, we don't need `final` for its members. I'lll remove them with the next update.
